name: Snap Blocks
description:
We're a small studio called Kosmos School. We're Dorena and Can. The best way to follow us is on Twitter (@kosmosschool). Additionally, you can find us on our Discord or reach via good old email (hello@kosmosschool.com).

We've published the source code for Snap Blocks on our GitHub.

After downloading the file, you can install ("sideload") it on your Quest via SideQuest or manually.
